scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:backend
scripts.serve: npm run build:frontend development && npm run start:backend
scripts.serve:dev: npm run build --mode dev && sudo rm -rf /var/www/test.wehub.work/dist/* && sudo cp -r frontend/dist/* /var/www/test.wehub.work/dist/ && sudo systemctl restart apache2 && pm2 restart backend
scripts.serve:prod: npm run build --mode production && sudo rm -rf /var/www/wehub.work/dist/* && sudo cp -r frontend/dist/* /var/www/wehub.work/dist/ && sudo systemctl restart apache2 && pm2 restart backend
